channel.title: Zibaldones on Alec S. Zabel-Mena, B.S.
channel.description: Recent content in Zibaldones on Alec S. Zabel-Mena, B.S.

item.title: Zettelkasten 1
item.description: I am thinking of starking a zettelkasten. The purpose of the zettelkasten would just to link mathematics definitions from various topics for my personal use. Of course, anyone else would be free to use it as well. I think, perhaps, I would link it a seperate webpage with a different theme. I need to look up more on how to set it up. A collegue of mine has it set up with a graph which would be nice. More on this endeavor later.

item.title: Zibaldone 3
item.description:
Lemma \(\text{Gal}(K/\mathbb{Q}) \cong (\mathbb{\Z}/\mathbb{m\Z})^\times\).

Proof. Ask a toddler on the street.

I got this one from an X post by @Anthony_Bonato.

item.title: Zibaldone 2
item.description: some mathematicians really be adding “po-” to everything – My Friend Sergio

item.title: Zibaldone 1
item.description:
A mathematician is a machine for turning coffee into theorems. – Alfréd Rényi

A comathematician is a machine for turning cotheorems into ffee.
